publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-311 Hugh O’Donnell: Business and Human Rights Resource Centre—That the Parliament congratulates the Business and Human Rights Resource Centre and the Chair of its International Advisory Network, Mary Robinson, former President of Ireland, on their work; welcomes the launch of the centre’s new website, www.business-humanrights.org, providing information about the human rights impacts, both positive and negative, of over 3,600 companies worldwide, and recognises the importance of private sector firms taking proper account of social and environmental factors in their operations and decision-making.
S3M-311 Business and Human Rights Resource Centre (lodged on 23 July 2007) Joe FitzPatrick*, Ross Finnie*, Rob Gibson*, Jim Hume*, Bill Kidd*, Robert Brown*
S3M-311 Business and Human Rights Resource Centre (lodged on 23 July 2007) Bob Doris*
S3M-311 Business and Human Rights Resource Centre (lodged on 23 July 2007) Sandra White*
S3M-311 Business and Human Rights Resource Centre (lodged on 23 July 2007) Hugh Henry*
